member.name: M:LogInApi.Controllers.CollaboratorController.GetCollaboratorsPaged(System.Int32,System.Int32,LogInApi.Enums.OrderCollaboratorColumn,LogInApi.Enums.OrderType)
member.summary: This method returns a PagedList of active Collaborators
member.response: Returns the PagedList with OK status
Returns an ERROR status due to invalid parameters

member.name: M:LogInApi.Controllers.CollaboratorController.GetDeactivatedCollaboratorsPaged(System.Int32,System.Int32,LogInApi.Enums.OrderCollaboratorColumn,LogInApi.Enums.OrderType)
member.summary: This method returns a PagedList of deactivated Collaborators
member.response: Returns the PagedList with OK status
Returns an ERROR status due to invalid parameters

member.name: M:LogInApi.Controllers.CollaboratorController.Get(System.String)
member.summary: This method returns an active Collaborator by Cpf
member.response: Returns the Collaborator with OK status
Returns an ERROR status due to collaborator not found

member.name: M:LogInApi.Controllers.CollaboratorController.GetDeactivated(System.String)
member.summary: This method returns a deactivated Collaborator by Cpf
member.response: Returns the Collaborator with OK status
Returns an ERROR status due to collaborator not found

member.name: M:LogInApi.Controllers.CollaboratorController.GetByName(System.String)
member.summary: This method returns an active Collaborator by Name
member.response: Returns the Collaborator with OK status
Returns an ERROR status due to collaborator not found

member.name: M:LogInApi.Controllers.CollaboratorController.GetByNameDeactivated(System.String)
member.summary: This method returns a deactivated Collaborator by Name
member.response: Returns the Collaborator with OK status
Returns an ERROR status due to collaborator not found

member.name: M:LogInApi.Controllers.CollaboratorController.Post(LogInApi.Dtos.CreateCollaboratorDto)
member.summary: This method creates a new Collaborator
member.remarks: All fields can be edited. Cpf is required and must be valid.
member.response: Returns the Collaborator with OK status
Returns an ERROR status due to validation error

member.name: M:LogInApi.Controllers.CollaboratorController.Put(System.String,LogInApi.Dtos.UpdateCollaboratorDto)
member.remarks: This method uses Cpf to search for the Collaborator. This method only searchs for active Collaborators. Only FullName, Phone, Sex and AddressId can be updated.
member.response: Returns an OK status with no content
Returns an ERROR status due to validation error
Returns an ERROR status due to collaborator not found

member.name: M:LogInApi.Controllers.CollaboratorController.Deactivate(System.String)
member.remarks: This method uses Cpf to search for the Collaborator. This method only searchs for active Collaborators.
member.response: Returns an OK status with no content
Returns an ERROR status due to collaborator not found

member.name: M:LogInApi.Controllers.CollaboratorController.Activate(System.String)
member.remarks: This method uses Cpf to search for the Collaborator. This method only searchs for deactivated Collaborators.
member.response: Returns an OK status with no content
Returns an ERROR status due to collaborator not found

member.name: T:LogInApi.Models.Collaborator
